hero.name: Hussein Ashraf
hero.jobTitle: Front-End Developer | Angular | React | WordPress | TypeScript | JavaScript
hero.description: I build responsive and interactive web applications...

about.description1: Frontend Developer with strong experience in React.js and Angular, and a solid foundation in modern web technologies including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6), and TypeScript. Skilled in building responsive, high-performance web applications with clean, maintainable code and excellent user experience. Experienced in working with REST APIs, modern UI frameworks, and state management tools. A proactive team player with strong problem-solving skills and a continuous learning mindset to deliver scalable and effective frontend solutions.
about.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science & AI
about.university: Beni Suef University, Faculty of Computer and Artificial Intelligence

Kamma.name: Kamma
Kamma.description: A freelance project for a pharmacy, developed as a modern Angular web application styled with Tailwind CSS and built using PrimeNG components, featuring responsive UI elements and a smooth user experience.

Fresh_Cart.name: Fresh Cart
Fresh_Cart.description: A full-featured e-commerce web application built with React and Context API, allowing users to browse products, manage a shopping cart, and complete orders through a responsive and user-friendly interface.

Al-Amen.name: Al-Amen Landscape
Al-Amen.description: A corporate website developed with React to showcase Al-Amen Landscape Company services, including agriculture, landscaping, and hardscaping, with a clean design and responsive layout.

Admin_Dashboard.name: Admin Dashboard
Admin_Dashboard.description: A data management dashboard built using React and Material UI, providing administrators with tools to visualize, manage, and organize data efficiently through a modern UI.

ECommerceAngular.name: E-Commerce Angular
ECommerceAngular.description: An Angular-based e-commerce application using TypeScript and Tailwind CSS, featuring product listings, authentication, and multilingual support via ngx-translate.

Foodie.name: Foodie
Foodie.description: A React web application that enables users to explore food categories and recipes, built with Tailwind CSS and Context API for efficient state management.

Data_List.name: Data List
Data_List.description: A React application for fetching and displaying data using Axios, featuring internationalization with i18next and a clean UI built with Tailwind CSS.

Yummy_(API-based project).name: Yummy (API-based Project)
Yummy_(API-based project).description: An API-driven JavaScript application that allows users to discover food categories and recipes, built with vanilla JavaScript and Bootstrap.

Weather_API.name: Weather API
Weather_API.description: A JavaScript-based weather application that fetches real-time weather data for cities worldwide using external APIs and displays it in a simple UI.

Rayal_Park.name: Rayal Park
Rayal_Park.description: A hotel booking web application built with JavaScript and Bootstrap, enabling users to view rooms and simulate the booking process.

Smart_Login.name: Smart Login
Smart_Login.description: A front-end authentication system implemented with JavaScript, featuring form validation and user login logic.

Bookmark_CRUD.name: Bookmark CRUD
Bookmark_CRUD.description: A CRUD application built with JavaScript that allows users to create, read, update, and delete bookmarks with persistent data handling.

CRUD.name: CRUD System
CRUD.description: A simple CRUD system demonstrating core JavaScript concepts for managing data through create, read, update, and delete operations.

Exam_Mentor.name: Exam Mentor
Exam_Mentor.description: An educational web application that helps students prepare for exams by providing interactive quizzes and questions fetched from APIs.

Daily_Reminders.name: Daily Reminders
Daily_Reminders.description: A productivity-focused web application that displays daily quotes and reminders using JavaScript and Bootstrap.

TICTAC_TOE.name: Tic-Tac-Toe
TICTAC_TOE.description: A classic tic-tac-toe game built with JavaScript, featuring interactive gameplay and simple game logic.

Stop_Watch.name: Stop Watch
Stop_Watch.description: A lightweight stopwatch application developed with JavaScript to track and control time intervals.

Daniels.name: Daniels
Daniels.description: A modern and responsive Bootstrap-based website template designed for showcasing restaurant or personal brand content.

DevFolio.name: DevFolio
DevFolio.description: A professional portfolio template built with Bootstrap, suitable for developers to showcase projects, skills, and experience.

Meallify.name: Meallify
Meallify.description: A responsive HTML and CSS website template focused on food-related content with a clean and modern layout.

Fokir.name: Fokir
Fokir.description: A simple and elegant HTML and CSS portfolio template designed for personal or freelance use.

TextInContact: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaboration. Feel free to reach out!
